00019 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbQueryElement { 
00020     friend class dbQuery;
00021     friend class dbCompiler;
00022     friend class dbQueryExpression;
00023     friend class dbQueryElementAllocator;
00024     friend class dbCLI;
00025   public:
00026     enum ElementType { 
00027         qExpression, // part of SQL expression
00028         qVarBool,
00029         qVarInt1,
00030         qVarInt2,
00031         qVarInt4,
00032         qVarInt8,
00033         qVarReal4,
00034         qVarReal8,
00035         qVarString,
00036         qVarStringPtr,
00037         qVarWString,
00038         qVarWStringPtr,
00039         qVarReference,
00040         qVarRectangle, 
00041         qVarRectanglePtr, 
00042         qVarArrayOfRef, 
00043         qVarArrayOfInt4,
00044         qVarArrayOfInt8,
00045         qVarArrayOfRefPtr,
00046         qVarArrayOfInt4Ptr,
00047         qVarArrayOfInt8Ptr,
00048         qVarRawData,
00049         qVarRawDataPtr,
00050 #ifdef USE_STD_STRING
00051         qVarStdString,
00052         qVarStdWString,
00053 #endif
00054         qVarUnknown
00055     };
00056     
00057     ElementType getType() const { return type; }
00058     dbQueryElement* nextElement() const { return next; }
00059 
00060     void* operator new (size_t size EXTRA_DEBUG_NEW_PARAMS);
00061     void  operator delete(void* p EXTRA_DEBUG_NEW_PARAMS);
00062 
00063     char* dump(char* buf);
00064     char* dumpValues(char* buf);
00065 
00066     dbQueryElement(ElementType t, void const* p, 
00067                    dbTableDescriptor* table = NULL) 
00068     {
00069         type = t;
00070         ptr  = p;       
00071         ref  = table;
00072         next = NULL;
00073     } 
00074   private:
00075     dbQueryElement*    next;
00076     void const*        ptr;
00077     ElementType        type;
00078     dbTableDescriptor* ref;
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00087 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbQueryElementAllocator { 
00088     friend class dbDatabase;
00089 
00090     dbMutex         mutex;
00091     dbQueryElement* freeChain;
00092     
00093   public:
00094     void deallocate(dbQueryElement* first, dbQueryElement** lastNext) { 
00095         dbCriticalSection cs(mutex);
00096         if (first != NULL) { 
00097             *lastNext = freeChain;
00098             freeChain = first;
00099         }
00100     }
00101         
00102     void* allocate(size_t size);
00103 
00104     dbQueryElementAllocator();
00105     ~dbQueryElementAllocator();
00106 
00107     void reset();
00108 
00109     static dbQueryElementAllocator instance;
00110 };

00131 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbComponent { 
00132   public:
00133     char const* structure;
00134     char const* field; 
00135 
00136     dbComponent(char const* s, char const* f=NULL) : structure(s), field(f) {}
00137 };

00146 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbQueryExpression { 
00147     friend class dbQuery;
00148     dbQueryElement*  first;
00149     dbQueryElement** last;
00150     bool             operand;
00151 
00152   public:
00153     dbQueryExpression& add(dbQueryElement::ElementType type, void const* ptr, dbTableDescriptor* table = NULL) {
00154         last = &(*last = new dbQueryElement(type, ptr, table))->next;
00155         operand = (type == dbQueryElement::qExpression);
00156         return *this;
00157     }
00158         
00159     dbQueryExpression& operator = (char const* ptr) { 
00160         first = NULL, last = &first;
00161         return add(dbQueryElement::qExpression, ptr);
00162     }
00163     dbQueryExpression& operator = (dbComponent const& comp);
00164 
00165     dbQueryExpression& operator = (dbQueryExpression const& expr);
00166 
00167     dbQueryExpression& operator,(int1 const& ptr) { 
00168         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarInt1, &ptr);
00169     }
00170     dbQueryExpression& operator,(int2 const& ptr) { 
00171         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarInt2, &ptr);
00172     }
00173     dbQueryExpression& operator,(int4 const& ptr) { 
00174         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarInt4, &ptr);
00175     }
00176     dbQueryExpression& operator,(db_int8 const& ptr) { 
00177         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarInt8, &ptr);
00178     }
00179     dbQueryExpression& operator,(nat1 const& ptr) {
00180         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarInt1, &ptr);
00181     }
00182     dbQueryExpression& operator,(nat2 const& ptr) {
00183         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarInt2, &ptr);
00184     }
00185     dbQueryExpression& operator,(nat4 const& ptr) {
00186         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarInt4, &ptr);
00187     }
00188     dbQueryExpression& operator,(db_nat8 const& ptr) {
00189         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarInt8, &ptr);
00190     }
00191 #if SIZEOF_LONG != 8 
00192     dbQueryExpression& operator,(long const& ptr) {
00193         return add(sizeof(long) == 4 ? dbQueryElement::qVarInt4 : dbQueryElement::qVarInt8, &ptr);
00194     }
00195     dbQueryExpression& operator,(unsigned long const& ptr) {
00196         return add(sizeof(long) == 4 ? dbQueryElement::qVarInt4 : dbQueryElement::qVarInt8, &ptr);
00197     }
00198 #endif
00199     dbQueryExpression& operator,(real4 const& ptr) { 
00200         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarReal4, &ptr);
00201     }
00202     dbQueryExpression& operator,(real8 const& ptr) { 
00203         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarReal8, &ptr);
00204     }
00205     dbQueryExpression& operator,(bool const& ptr) { 
00206         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarBool, &ptr);
00207     }
00208     dbQueryExpression& operator,(char const* ptr) { 
00209         return add(operand ? dbQueryElement::qVarString 
00210                    : dbQueryElement::qExpression, ptr);
00211     }
00212     dbQueryExpression& operator,(char const** ptr) { 
00213         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarStringPtr, ptr);
00214     }
00215     dbQueryExpression& operator,(char** ptr) { 
00216         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarStringPtr, ptr);
00217     }
00218     dbQueryExpression& operator,(wchar_t const* ptr) { 
00219         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarWString, ptr);
00220     }
00221     dbQueryExpression& operator,(wchar_t const** ptr) { 
00222         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarWStringPtr, ptr);
00223     }
00224     dbQueryExpression& operator,(wchar_t** ptr) { 
00225         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarWStringPtr, ptr);
00226     }
00227     dbQueryExpression& operator,(void const* ptr) { 
00228         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarRawData, ptr);
00229     }
00230     dbQueryExpression& operator,(void** ptr) { 
00231         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarRawDataPtr, ptr);
00232     }
00233     dbQueryExpression& operator,(rectangle const& rect) {
00234         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarRectangle, &rect);
00235     }
00236     dbQueryExpression& operator,(rectangle* rect) {
00237         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarRectanglePtr, &rect);
00238     }
00239 #ifdef USE_STD_STRING
00240     dbQueryExpression& operator,(std::string const& str) {
00241         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarStdString, &str);
00242     }
00243     dbQueryExpression& operator,(std::wstring const& str) {
00244         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarStdWString, &str);
00245     }
00246 #endif
00247     dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbQueryExpression const& expr) { 
00248         *last = new dbQueryElement(dbQueryElement::qExpression, "(");
00249         (*last)->next = expr.first;
00250         last = expr.last;
00251         *last = new dbQueryElement(dbQueryElement::qExpression, ")");
00252         last = &(*last)->next;
00253         operand = false;
00254         return *this;
00255     }
00256     dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbComponent const& comp) { 
00257         add(dbQueryElement::qExpression, comp.structure);
00258         if (comp.field != NULL) { 
00259             add(dbQueryElement::qExpression, ".");
00260             add(dbQueryElement::qExpression, comp.field);
00261         }
00262         operand = false;
00263         return *this;
00264     }
00265     dbQueryExpression& operator += (dbComponent const& comp) { 
00266         return *this,comp;
00267     }
00268     dbQueryExpression& operator += (char const* ptr) { 
00269         return add(dbQueryElement::qExpression, ptr);
00270     }
00271 #ifndef NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00272     template<class T>
00273     dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbReference<T> const& value) { 
00274         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarReference, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00275     }
00276 
00277     template<class T>
00278     inline dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbArray< dbReference<T> > const& value) { 
00279         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfRef, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00280     }
00281 
00282     template<class T>
00283     inline dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbArray< dbReference<T> >const* const& value) { 
00284         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfRefPtr, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00285     }
00286 #endif
00287 #if !defined(_MSC_VER) || _MSC_VER+0 >= 1300
00288     inline dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbArray<db_int4> const& value) { 
00289         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfInt4, &value);
00290     }
00291 
00292     inline dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbArray<db_int4>const* const& value) { 
00293         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfInt4Ptr, &value);
00294     }
00295 
00296     inline dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbArray<db_int8> const& value) { 
00297         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfInt8, &value);
00298     }
00299 
00300     inline dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbArray<db_int8>const* const& value) { 
00301         return add(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfInt8Ptr, &value);
00302     }
00303 #endif
00304 };

00313 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbCompiledQuery { 
00314   public:
00315     dbExprNode*        tree;
00316     dbOrderByNode*     order;
00317     dbFollowByNode*    follow;
00318     dbTableDescriptor* table;
00319     int                schemeVersion;
00320 
00321     size_t             stmtLimitStart;
00322     size_t             stmtLimitLen;
00323     int4*              stmtLimitStartPtr;
00324     int4*              stmtLimitLenPtr;
00325     bool               limitSpecified;
00326 
00327     enum IteratorInit { 
00328         StartFromAny,
00329         StartFromFirst,
00330         StartFromLast,
00331         StartFromRef, 
00332         StartFromArray,
00333         StartFromArrayPtr
00334     };
00335     IteratorInit       startFrom;
00336     void const*        root;
00337 
00338     void destroy();
00339 
00340     bool compiled() { return tree != NULL; }
00341 
00342     bool compileError() { return !compiled(); }
00343 
00344     dbCompiledQuery() { 
00345         tree = NULL;
00346         order = NULL;
00347         follow = NULL;
00348         table = NULL;
00349         startFrom = StartFromAny;
00350         limitSpecified = false;
00351     }
00352 };

00358 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbQuery : public dbCompiledQuery { 
00359     friend class dbCompiler;
00360     friend class dbDatabase;
00361     friend class dbSubSql;
00362     friend class dbCLI;
00363   private:
00364     dbMutex            mutex;
00365     dbQueryElement*    elements;
00366     dbQueryElement**   nextElement;
00367     bool               operand;
00368     bool               mutexLocked;
00369 
00370     //
00371     // Prohibite query copying
00372     //
00373     dbQuery(dbQuery const&) : dbCompiledQuery() {} 
00374     dbQuery& operator =(dbQuery const&) { return *this; }
00375 
00376   public:
00377     int                pos; // position of condition in statement
00378 
00379 
00380     char* dump(char* buf) { 
00381         char* p = buf;
00382         for (dbQueryElement* elem = elements; elem != NULL; elem = elem->next) { 
00383             p = elem->dump(p);
00384         }
00385         return buf;
00386     }
00387 
00388     char* dumpValues(char* buf) { 
00389         char* p = buf;
00390         for (dbQueryElement* elem = elements; elem != NULL; elem = elem->next) { 
00391             p = elem->dumpValues(p);
00392         }
00393         return buf;
00394     }
00395 
00396     dbQuery& append(dbQueryElement::ElementType type, void const* ptr,
00397                     dbTableDescriptor* table = NULL) 
00398     { 
00399         nextElement = &(*nextElement=new dbQueryElement(type,ptr,table))->next;
00400         operand = (type == dbQueryElement::qExpression);
00401         return *this;
00402     }
00403 
00404     dbQuery& reset();
00405 
00406     //
00407     // Redefined operator = and , make it possible to specify query in the
00408     // following way:
00409     //         int x, y;
00410     //         dbDataTime dt;
00411     //         dbQuery q; 
00412     //         dbCursor<record> cursor;
00413     //         q = "x=",x,"and y=",y,"and",dt == "date";
00414     //         for (x = 0; x < max_x; x++) { 
00415     //             for (y = 0; y < max_y; y++) { 
00416     //                 cursor.select(q);
00417     //                 ...
00418     //             }
00419     //         }
00420 
00421     dbQuery& add(dbQueryExpression const& expr); 
00422 
00423     dbQuery& And(dbQueryExpression const& expr) { 
00424         if (elements != NULL) { 
00425             append(dbQueryElement::qExpression, "and");
00426         }
00427         return add(expr);
00428     }
00429 
00430     dbQuery& Or(dbQueryExpression const& expr) { 
00431         if (elements != NULL) { 
00432             append(dbQueryElement::qExpression, "or");
00433         }
00434         return add(expr);
00435     }
00436 
00437     dbQuery& And(char const* str) { 
00438         if (elements != NULL) { 
00439             append(dbQueryElement::qExpression, "and");
00440         }
00441         return append(dbQueryElement::qExpression, str);
00442     }
00443 
00444     dbQuery& Or(char const* str) { 
00445         if (elements != NULL) { 
00446             append(dbQueryElement::qExpression, "or");
00447         }
00448         return append(dbQueryElement::qExpression, str);
00449     }
00450 
00451     dbQuery& add(char const* str) { 
00452         return append(operand ? dbQueryElement::qVarString 
00453                       : dbQueryElement::qExpression, str);
00454     }
00455     dbQuery& add(char const** str) { 
00456         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarStringPtr, str);
00457     }
00458     dbQuery& add(wchar_t const* str) { 
00459         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarWString, str);
00460     }
00461     dbQuery& add(wchar_t const** str) { 
00462         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarWStringPtr, str);
00463     }
00464     dbQuery& add(rectangle const& rect) {
00465         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarRectangle, &rect);
00466     }
00467     dbQuery& add(rectangle* rect) {
00468         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarRectanglePtr, &rect);
00469     }
00470 #ifdef USE_STD_STRING
00471     dbQuery& add(std::string const& str) { 
00472         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarStdString, &str);
00473     }
00474     dbQuery& operator,(std::string const& str) { return add(str); }
00475     dbQuery& add(std::wstring const& str) { 
00476         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarStdWString, &str);
00477     }
00478     dbQuery& operator,(std::wstring const& str) { return add(str); }
00479 #endif
00480     dbQuery& add(char** str) { 
00481         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarStringPtr, str);
00482     }
00483     dbQuery& add(wchar_t** str) { 
00484         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarWStringPtr, str);
00485     }
00486     dbQuery& add(int1 const& value) { 
00487         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarInt1, &value);
00488     }
00489     dbQuery& add (int2 const& value) { 
00490         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarInt2, &value);
00491     }
00492     dbQuery& add (int4 const& value) { 
00493         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarInt4, &value);
00494     }
00495     dbQuery& add (db_int8 const& value) { 
00496         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarInt8, &value);
00497     }
00498     dbQuery& add(nat1 const& value) {
00499         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarInt1, &value);
00500     }
00501     dbQuery& add (nat2 const& value) {
00502         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarInt2, &value);
00503     }
00504     dbQuery& add (nat4 const& value) {
00505         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarInt4, &value);
00506     }
00507     dbQuery& add (db_nat8 const& value) {
00508         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarInt8, &value);
00509     }
00510 #if SIZEOF_LONG != 8 
00511     dbQuery& add (long const& value) {
00512         return append(sizeof(long) == 4 ? dbQueryElement::qVarInt4 : dbQueryElement::qVarInt8, &value);
00513     }
00514     dbQuery& add (unsigned long const& value) {
00515         return append(sizeof(long) == 4 ? dbQueryElement::qVarInt4 : dbQueryElement::qVarInt8, &value);
00516     }
00517 #endif
00518     dbQuery& add (real4 const& value) { 
00519         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarReal4, &value);
00520     }
00521     dbQuery& add(real8 const& value) { 
00522         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarReal8, &value);
00523     }
00524     dbQuery& add(bool const& value) { 
00525         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarBool, &value);
00526     }
00527     dbQuery& add(void const* value) { 
00528         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarRawData, value);
00529     }
00530     dbQuery& add(void** value) { 
00531         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarRawDataPtr, value);
00532     }
00533 
00534     dbQuery& operator,(char const*  value) { return add(value); }
00535     dbQuery& operator,(char const** value) { return add(value); }
00536     dbQuery& operator,(char** value) { return add(value); }
00537     dbQuery& operator,(wchar_t const*  value) { return add(value); }
00538     dbQuery& operator,(wchar_t const** value) { return add(value); }
00539     dbQuery& operator,(wchar_t** value) { return add(value); }
00540     dbQuery& operator,(int1 const&  value) { return add(value); }
00541     dbQuery& operator,(int2 const&  value) { return add(value); }
00542     dbQuery& operator,(int4 const&  value) { return add(value); }
00543     dbQuery& operator,(db_int8 const&  value) { return add(value); }
00544     dbQuery& operator,(nat1 const&  value) { return add(value); }
00545     dbQuery& operator,(nat2 const&  value) { return add(value); }
00546     dbQuery& operator,(nat4 const&  value) { return add(value); }
00547     dbQuery& operator,(db_nat8 const&  value) { return add(value); }
00548 #if SIZEOF_LONG != 8
00549     dbQuery& operator,(long const&  value) { return add(value); }
00550     dbQuery& operator,(unsigned long const&  value) { return add(value); }
00551 #endif
00552     dbQuery& operator,(real4 const& value) { return add(value); }
00553     dbQuery& operator,(real8 const& value) { return add(value); }
00554     dbQuery& operator,(bool const&  value) { return add(value); }
00555     dbQuery& operator,(void const*  value) { return add(value); }
00556     dbQuery& operator,(dbQueryExpression const& expr) { return add(expr); }
00557     dbQuery& operator,(rectangle const& rect) { return add(rect); }
00558 
00559     dbQuery& operator = (const char* str) { 
00560         return reset().append(dbQueryElement::qExpression, str);
00561     }
00562 
00563 #if !defined(_MSC_VER) || _MSC_VER+0 >= 1300
00564     inline dbQuery& operator,(dbArray<db_int4> const& value) { 
00565         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfInt4, &value);
00566     }
00567

00569         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfInt4Ptr, &value);
00570     }

00597 #ifndef NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00598     template<class T>
00599     dbQuery& operator,(dbReference<T> const& value) { 
00600         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarReference, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00601     }
00602 
00603     template<class T>
00604     inline dbQuery& operator,(dbArray< dbReference<T> > const& value) { 
00605         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfRef, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00606     }
00607 
00608     template<class T>
00609     inline dbQuery& operator,(dbArray< dbReference<T> >const* const& value) { 
00610         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfRefPtr, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00611     }
00612 
00613     template<class T>
00614     dbQuery& add(dbReference<T> const& value) { 
00615         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarReference, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00616     }
00617 
00618     template<class T>
00619     dbQuery& add(dbArray< dbReference<T> > const& value) { 
00620         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfRef, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00621     }
00622     template<class T>
00623     dbQuery& add(dbArray< dbReference<T> >const* const& value) { 
00624         return append(dbQueryElement::qVarArrayOfRefPtr, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00625     }
00626 
00627     template<class T>
00628     dbQuery& operator = (T const& value) { 
00629         return reset().add(value);
00630     }   
00631 #else
00632     dbQuery& operator = (dbQueryExpression const& expr) {
00633         return reset().add(expr);
00634     }    
00635     dbQuery& operator = (rectangle const& expr) {
00636         return reset().add(expr);
00637     }    
00638 #endif
00639 
00640 
00641     dbQueryElement* getElements() const { 
00642         return elements;
00643     }
00644 
00645     bool isEmpty() { 
00646         return elements == NULL 
00647             || (elements->next == NULL && elements->type == dbQueryElement::qExpression && *(char*)elements->ptr == 0);
00648     }
00649 
00650     dbQuery() { 
00651         elements = NULL;
00652         nextElement = &elements;
00653         operand = false;
00654         pos = 0;
00655     } 
00656     dbQuery(char const* str) { 
00657         elements = new dbQueryElement(dbQueryElement::qExpression, str);
00658         nextElement = &elements->next;
00659         operand = true;
00660         pos = 0;
00661     } 
00662     ~dbQuery() { 
00663         reset();
00664     }
00665 };
00666 
00667 #ifdef NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00668 template<class T>
00669 inline dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbQueryExpression& expr, dbReference<T> const& value) { 
00670     return expr.add(dbQueryElement::qVarReference, &value, &T::dbDescriptor);
00671 }
00672 template<class T>
00673 inline dbQueryExpression& operator,(dbQueryExpression& expr, dbArray< dbReference<T> > const& value) {

00722 #define USER_FUNC(f) static dbUserFunction f##_descriptor(&f, (char*)#f)

00731 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY  dbUserFunctionArgument { 
00732   public:
00733     enum dbArgumentType { 
00734         atInteger, 
00735         atBoolean, 
00736         atString, 
00737         atReal, 
00738         atReference, 
00739         atRawBinary,
00740         atWString
00741     };  
00742     dbArgumentType type; 
00743     union {
00744         real8          realValue;
00745         db_int8        intValue;
00746         bool           boolValue;
00747         char const*    strValue;
00748         wchar_t const* wstrValue;
00749         oid_t          oidValue;
00750         void*          rawValue;
00751     } u;
00752 
00753   private:
00754     friend class dbDatabase;
00755     dbUserFunctionArgument(dbExprNode*             expr, 
00756                            dbInheritedAttribute&   iattr, 
00757                            dbSynthesizedAttribute& sattr, 
00758                            int                     i);
00759 };

00769 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbUserFunction { 
00770     friend class dbDatabase;
00771     friend class dbCompiler;
00772 
00773     void* fptr;
00774     char* fname;
00775     
00776     dbUserFunction* next;
00777     static dbUserFunction* list;
00778 
00779     enum funcType {
00780         fInt2Bool,
00781         fReal2Bool,
00782         fStr2Bool,
00783         fWStr2Bool,
00784         fInt2Int,
00785         fReal2Int,
00786         fStr2Int,
00787         fWStr2Int,
00788         fInt2Real,
00789         fReal2Real,
00790         fStr2Real,
00791         fWStr2Real,
00792         fInt2Str,
00793         fReal2Str,
00794         fStr2Str, 
00795         fWStr2Str, 
00796         fInt2WStr,
00797         fReal2WStr,
00798         fStr2WStr, 
00799         fWStr2WStr, 
00800         fArg2Bool, 
00801         fArg2Int, 
00802         fArg2Real, 
00803         fArg2Str, 
00804         fArg2WStr, 
00805         fArgArg2Bool, 
00806         fArgArg2Int, 
00807         fArgArg2Real, 
00808         fArgArg2Str, 
00809         fArgArg2WStr, 
00810         fArgArgArg2Bool, 
00811         fArgArgArg2Int, 
00812         fArgArgArg2Real, 
00813         fArgArgArg2Str,
00814         fArgArgArg2WStr
00815     };
00816     int type;
00817 
00818     void bind(char* name, void* f, funcType ftype);
00819 
00820   public:
00821 
00822     static dbUserFunction* find(char const* name) { 
00823         for (dbUserFunction* func = list; func != NULL; func = func->next) { 
00824             if (name == func->fname) { 
00825                 return func;
00826             }
00827         }
00828         return NULL;
00829     }
00830     
00831     int getParameterType();
00832 
00833     int getNumberOfParameters();
00834

00836         bind(name, (void*)f, fInt2Bool); 
00837     }

00839         bind(name, (void*)f, fReal2Bool); 
00840     }
